org.easybatch.core.api

Interface EventManager


  • public interface EventManager
    Interface for the event manager.

    There is one local implementation included. It could also be implemented using JMS or any other distributed technology to get to know of any event happened while the batch is being processed.

    Please note that if you implement something like a global or singleton event handler you must care for synchronized access for your self.

    Author:
    Mario Mueller (mario@xenji.com)

                           java.util.Set<ValidationError> validationErrors)
        Called after the record is validated.
        Parameters:
        validatedRecord - The validated record.
        validationErrors - The set of validation errors that came out.

      • fireBeforeProcessingRecord

        void fireBeforeProcessingRecord(java.lang.Object record)
        Called before the record gets processed.
        Parameters:
        record - The record to be processed.

      • fireAfterProcessingRecord

        void fireAfterProcessingRecord(java.lang.Object record,
                             java.lang.Object processResult)
        Called after the processing is done. Do not use this method to do additional work on the record or the result.
        Parameters:
        record - The record that has been processed.
        processResult - The processing result, if any. This can be a null reference.

      • fireOnRecordProcessingException

        void fireOnRecordProcessingException(java.lang.Object record,
                                   java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Called when an exception occurs during record processing
        Parameters:
        record - the current processed record
        throwable - the exception occurred during record processing
